snippet.title: Still Time - Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Still Time is a 2D puzzle platformer about time travel and temporal physics. As the protagonist discovers their powers, you will learn how to control the flow of time.

This unique ability will allow you to solve puzzles and to overcome obstacles that would otherwise be impossible for a single player. Platforms, boxes, sensors, lasers... all the puzzle games you are familiar with will suddenly feel new and challenging when coupled with time travel.
